title: View near Popayan including Mount Purese Volcano,Cauca River, Colombia
medium:
Recto: Graphite, touched with brush and oxidized white gouache on greenish paper
Verso: Graphite, touched with brush and oxidized white gouache on greenish paper
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view of a valley of a plateau with the volcano seen at right center of background mountains, and small scattered houses at left, center and right middleground.

Verso:  Horizontal view of two houses in the foreground with more houses in a valley bordered by mountains in the background.
name: Drawing
